Name: Nekomancy
About the game: Delve into the ancient catacombs and slay Eldritch beings as a cat crafting and wielding spells! Crafting! Spells come in 4 component types. Patterns, Shapes, Effects, and Mods. Patterns determine how many effects or mods the spell can have and also determines if the spell is rapid fire, semi auto, or charged Shapes change how the spell is delivered. Projectile will lob a ball forward, self will make the spell hit yourself, area will make a rapidly expanding bubble, etc. There are a lot of shapes to experiment with! Effects effect what the spell does when it hits the target, freeze them, heal them, or even duplicate them! Mods change various things about the spell. Make it bouncy, make it explode, make it pierce, etc Spells! Spells can be equiped in your left or right hand and casted using mana. They can also be fired out of charms or even on the impact of your spells with the help of a binding altar! Charms! Charms will cast the spell you slot into them when a condition is met for example: When HP goes below 50% cast Self heal. You can equip up to 5 charms! Nekonomicon! The Nekonomicon is the progression system for nekomancy! Bosses will drop knowledge that can be spent in the Nekonomicon when you die. Its a skill tree with some insane synergies! Be careful though, as you progress so will your madness and more deadly creatures will hunt you for your knowledge! Altars! Altars can be found throughout the dungeons and usually offer a benefit at a cost The altar of corruption has a 75% chance to destroy your spell but a 25% chance to Greatly buff it! The altar of binding lets you cast a spell on the impact of another spell! The altar of sacrifice decreases one stat but greatly increases another The altar of dismemberment can remove arms for stronger spells! Levels! As of right now there are 3 dungeon types that you will make your way through. The Hills, The Catacombs, and the Sanguine Depths! Each level is procedually generated! Movement! Wall jump, slam, and slide your way through dungeons! Unlocks! Unlock new cats with unique passives and different stats!
